Karnaval Budaya Hari Jadi Pangandaran Berlangsung Semarak
03 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Agus Kusnadi
PANGANDARAN, (PR).- Sepanjang jalan Lapangan Katapang Doyong di Pantai Timur hingga jalur Pantai Barat Pangandaran dipadati berbagai kendaraan hias dan seni budaya. Parade tersebut merupakan bagian dari karnaval budaya dalam rangka memeriahkan Hari Ulang Tahun ke-7 Kabupaten Pangandaran tahun 2019.
Pernak-pernik pertunjukan dan kendaraan hias dari masing-masing dinas, kecamatan, dan warga yang ditampilkan menjadi daya tarik karnaval.
Iring-iringan karnaval melintasi panggung kehormatan tempat Bupati Pangandaran Jeje Wiradinata, dan sejumlah tokoh lainnya berada.
Salah seorang penari peserta karnaval dari Purwakarta menyerahkan patung Nyi Pohaci yang diterima Bupati serta Wakil Bupati Pangandaran dan diikuti penyerahan berbagai makanan hasil bumi dari sejumlah desa.
Dari ratusan peserta, rombongan karnaval dari Telkom Bandung dan sanggar Nyi Pohaci Kabupaten Purwakarta juga ikut memeriahkan acara tersebut.



Kepala Dinas Pariwisata dan Kebudayaan Pangandaran Undang Sohbarudin mengatakan, karnaval budaya yang digelar tahun ini merupakan salah bentuk satu pelestarian dan pemanfaatan seni budaya yang ada di Pangandaran.
"Selain seni budaya, juga ada tampilan fashion, drum band dari sekolah pelayaran, serta rombongan karnaval Purwakarta dan Bandung yang ikut memeriahkan karnaval budaya ini," kata Undang, Minggu 3 November 2019.
Salah satu tujuan dilaksanakannya karnaval budaya, kata Undang, adalah untuk menunjang pariwisata dan sudah menjadi even tahunan di Pangandaran.



Dalam kesempatan itu, Bupati Pangandaran Jeje Wiradinata mengatakan, â€œRasanya baru kemarin, ketika presidium dan masyarakat di Pangandaran tengah memperjuangkan pemekaran Pangandaran. Hari ini sudah 7 tahun bersama membangun untuk Pangandaran yang lebih hebat," ucapnya.
Menurut Jeje Wiradinata, pembangunan yang sudah dilakukan selama masa jabatan Jeje-Adang, sudah dirasakan masyarakat. Salah satunya adalah pembangunan infrastruktur dan puskesmas serta program-program unggulan lainnya seperti pendidikan dan kesehatan gratis.
Karnaval budaya yang digelar Dinas Pariwisata dan Kebudayaan untuk memeriahkan Hari Jadi Pangandaran digelar sehari penuh dan dilanjutkan dengan kegiatan Napak Jagat Pasundan.
Menambah waktu berwisata
Biasanya, pada hari Minggu, pengunjung wisata langsung pulang ke kampung setelah menghabiskan waktu liburan akhir pekannya di obyek wisata pantai Pangandaran.
Akan tetapi, setelah mengetahui adanya karnaval budaya, wisatawan menunda kepulangannya.
Ridwan (45), wisatawan asal Tamansari Jakarta Barat, setelah mengetahui ada karnaval budaya di Pangandaran, bersama keluarga menambah hari untuk tinggal dan menginap di hotel.
"Katanya ada karnaval budaya di Pangandaran, kami ingin menonyon sampai saya booking lagi kamar," ujar Ridwan,
Dia mengatakan, obyek wisata pantai Pangandaran kini sudah mengalami banyak perubahan.
"Sekarang (fasilitas) di pantainya sedang dibangun, pastinya saya penasaran dan tahun depan ingin berlibur lagi ke Pangandaran. Kalau bisa, diperbanyak parade budaya agar wisatawan betah dan bisa menikmati liburannya," ucap Ridwan.***

The Carnival of the Pangandaran Anniversary Day Goes On Lively
03 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Agus Kusnadi
PANGANDARAN, (PR) .- Along the Katapang Doyong Field road on the East Coast to the West Coast path of Pangandaran, there are various ornamental vehicles and cultural arts. The parade is part of a cultural carnival in order to enliven the 7th Birthday of Pangandaran Regency in 2019.
Performance trinkets and ornamental vehicles from each department, sub-district and residents displayed were the main attraction of the carnival.
A carnival procession crosses the honorary stage where Pangandaran Regent Jeje Wiradinata, and a number of other figures are located.
One of the dancers participating in the carnival from Purwakarta handed over the statue of Nyi Pohaci which was received by the Regent and Deputy Regent of Pangandaran and followed by the delivery of various food products from a number of villages.
Of the hundreds of participants, the carnival troupe from Telkom Bandung and the Nyi Pohaci studio in Purwakarta Regency also enlivened the event.



Pangandaran Head of Tourism and Culture, UU Sohbarudin, said that the cultural carnival that was held this year was a form of preservation and utilization of cultural arts in Pangandaran.
"In addition to cultural arts, there are also fashion shows, drum bands from shipping schools, as well as Purwakarta and Bandung carnival troupes who took part in enlivening this cultural carnival," said UU, Sunday 3 November 2019.
One of the aims of the cultural carnival, said UU, is to support tourism and has become an annual event in Pangandaran.



On that occasion, Pangandaran Regent Jeje Wiradinata said, "It was only yesterday, when the presidium and the people in Pangandaran were fighting for the expansion of Pangandaran. Today it has been 7 years together to build a greater Pangandaran, "he said.
According to Jeje Wiradinata, the development that had been carried out during Jeje-Adang's tenure had been felt by the community. One of them is the development of infrastructure and puskesmas and other leading programs such as free education and health.
Cultural Carnival held by the Tourism and Culture Office to enliven Pangandaran Anniversary was held for a full day and continued with Pasak Jagat Jagak activities.
Add time to travel
Usually, on Sundays, tourist visitors go straight back to their villages after spending their weekend vacation time at Pangandaran beach attractions.
However, after learning of the cultural carnival, tourists delay their return.
Ridwan (45), a tourist from Tamansari, West Jakarta, after learning that there is a cultural carnival in Pangandaran, with his family added days to stay and stay at the hotel.
"He said there is a cultural carnival in Pangandaran, we want to wait until I book a room again," Ridwan said,
He said, Pangandaran beach attractions have now experienced many changes.
"Now (facilities) on the beach are being built, I am certainly curious and next year I want to take a vacation again to Pangandaran. If possible, a cultural parade will be added so that tourists feel at home and can enjoy their vacation," said Ridwan. ***
